thread.title: Sales at Wal-Mart’s U.K. Business Asda Fall Nearly 5%
thread.title_full: Sales at Wal-Mart’s U.K. Business Asda Fall Nearly 5% - WSJ

author: Saabira Chaudhuri
title: Sales at Wal-Mart’s U.K. Business Asda Fall Nearly 5%
text:
Wal-Mart Stores Inc.’s U.K. arm Asda reported a 4.7% fall in same-store sales in the second quarter, as the company continued to be hammered by a change in customer behavior and a vicious price war that has buffeted the U.K.’s largest grocers.
Asda, which vies with J Sainsbury PLC, for the position of Britain’s second-largest grocer, has lost market share lately, as German rivals Aldi and Lidl have stepped up their game in the...
